repos.name: angular-multi-select
repos.description: A multi select dropdown directive for AngularJS. Allows you to use HTML tags and CSS in the data. Requires only AngularJS and nothing else.

repos.name: inoERP
repos.description: inoERP is an open source php based  enterprise management system. The ERP systems contain all the functionalities required for running any manufacturing, service or distribution organization. The features are very similar to Oracle R12/ Fusion Application and SAP. It also contains a light weight CMS which seamlessly integrates with the ERP.

repos.name: flask-limiter
repos.description: rate limiting extension for flask applications

repos.name: www.submarinecablemap.com
repos.description: Comprehensive interactive map of the world's major operating and planned submarine cable systems and landing stations, updated frequently.

repos.name: ids_please
repos.description: Helps to get IDs or screen names from links to social network accounts
